build.beforeBuildCommand: npm run server:build && npm run build

security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' tauri: ipc: http://ipc.localhost http://127.0.0.1:*
